Reference version 0.2

Clustering

Functions to compute the grouping on firms

grouping.append

Append result of a grouping to a data-set

grouping.classify.once

clusters firms based on their cross-sectional wage distributions

grouping.classify

clusters firms based on their cross-sectional wage distributions

grouping.computeobj

Compute the objective function of the clustering

grouping.getMeasures

Extract the measurement matrix to be given to the classification algorithm

grouping.infos

extract information

Estimating Interacted model

Functions to estimate the interacted model using the clustered data.

m2.mini.estimate

estimates interacted model

m2.mini.impute.movers

imputes data for movers according to the model. The results are stored in k_imp, y1_imp, y2_imp

m2.mini.impute.stayers

imputes data according to the model

m2.mini.liml.int.fixb

this function uses LIML to estimate a model with a given normalization and we want to do it in a non-stationary way.

m2.mini.liml.int.prof

this function uses LIML to estimate a model with a given normalization. In estimation the interaction terms B are profiled out in period 2 first, then they are used to recover the intercepts in both periods.

m2.mini.liml.int

this function uses LIML to estimate a model with a given normalization and we want to do it in a non-stationary way

m2.mini.liml.int2

this function uses LIML to estimate a model with a given normalization and we want to do it in a non-stationary way.

m2.mini.liml.int3

this function uses LIML to estimate a model with a given normalization and we want to do it in a non-stationary way.

m2.mini.linear.int

this function uses performs an estimation like the LIML but forcing all the Bs=1. This is like an AKM estimator.

m2.mini.new

Model creation

m2.mini.nls.int2

this function uses LIML to estimate a model with a given normalization and we want to do it in a non-stationary way.

m2.mini.plotw

plotting mini model

m2.mini.rc.lik.grad

gradient function

m2.mini.rc.lik

Random coefficient estimator for the mini-model

m2.mini.simulate.movers

simulate movers according to the model

m2.mini.simulate

simulate a dataset according to the model

m2.mini.simulate.stayers

simulate movers according to the model

m2.mini.vdec

Computes the variance decomposition by simulation

m2.miniql.estimate

estimates interacted model using quasi-linkelood on the data moments

Estimating Mixture model

Functions to estimate the mixture model using the clustered data.

m2.mixt.estimate.all

Estimates the static mixture model on 2 periods

m2.mixt.meaneffect

Compute mean effects

m2.mixt.movers

Estimates the static model parameters for movers

m2.mixt.simulate.movers

Using the model, simulates a dataset of movers

m2.mixt.simulate.sim

Simulates data (movers and stayers) and attached firms ids. Firms have all same expected size.

m2.mixt.simulate.stayers

Using the model, simulates a dataset of stayers.

m2.mixt.simulate.stayers.withx

Using the model, simulates a dataset of stayers.

m2.mixt.stayers

use the marginal distributions to extract type distributions within each cluster and observable characteristics

m2.mixt.vdec

Computes the variance decomposition by simulation
